nodes.text: Xakrea was a major city located on the planet Darkknell. It was the capital of the Daimanate during the Republic Dark Age and contained the Sith Lord Daiman's Sanctum Celestial, his palace. During the Battle of Darkknell, it was flooded and damaged by an artificial global flood unleashed by the Hutt crimelord Zodoh's Stormdrivers.
